scripts.build:base: pnpm run prepare:base && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum: pnpm run prepare:arbitrum && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:mainnet: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:mainnet && graph deploy summer-auctions --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.build:mainnet: pnpm run prepare:mainnet && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:base: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:base && graph deploy summer-auctions-base --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy summer-auctions-arbitrum --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:mainnet:local: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:mainnet && graph create summer-auctions-mainnet --node http://44.212.44.0:8020 && graph deploy summer-auctions-mainnet --node http://44.212.44.0:8020 --ipfs http://44.212.44.0:5001 --version-label $npm_package_version'
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm run deploy:base && pnpm run deploy:arbitrum && pnpm run deploy:mainnet
